bronze.task: Investigate a West Sussex based Entrepreneur
bronze.description: Find and Investigate three West Sussex based Entrepreneurs

silver.task: Investigate a UK or Worldwide based Entrepreneur

silver.task: Take your Bronze idea and write a business plan
silver.description: Take your Bronze Pillar 1 idea and write a plan of how it could become a business

silver.task: Make a call with an Entrepreneur to ask questions about their journey - ask Mr Dean
silver.description: Make a Zoom call chat with an Entrepreneur to ask questions about their journey - ask Mr Dean for contact details (A member of Staff will be present on the Zoom)

silver.task: Anything is Possible
silver.description: Anything is Possible - Extend your Learning and Understanding. You can add anything relevant to your entrepreneurialism as evidence. This does not have to be completed to get this level but will help with the next level.
